short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Google Maps images in Google Search Results clickable and add back the Maps tab for seamless navigation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open Google Maps instantly from Google Search results either by clicking on a Google Maps image or by clicking on the Maps tab.

Enable seamless navigation again between Google Maps and Google Search. This extension is particularly useful for EU users, so if you miss these standard features, this extension is for you.

Key features:
- Bring back the Maps tab (with multilingual support for all languages in the EU)
- Map images (both static and dynamic) are now clickable and bring you directly to the location in Google Maps
- Install and forget - no need to adjust any settings, this works out of the box.
- Secure - the extension only needs permission for Google Search related domains.
- Extremely lightweight - enjoy great performance in Google Search results are the extension is very lightweight and does not consume any meaningful resources.
- Supports both Light and Dark mode.

For Opera users, you can use this extension too by enabling the "Allow access to search page results" option in the Opera extension settings.
